sen.j: 快誉（かいよ、長元9年（1036年） - 天永3年8月14日 (旧暦)（1112年9月6日））は、平安時代末期（院政期）の僧侶。
sen.e: Kaiyo (快誉) (1036-September 6, 1112) was a Buddhist monk at the end of the Heian Period (the cloister government period).
sen.cmt: 院政→ cloister government [英辞郎 on the WEB]

sen.j: 源頼義の四男（あるいは五男）。
sen.e: The forth (or fifth) son of MINAMOTO no Yoriyoshi.

sen.j: 比叡山延暦寺に出家し、伊予阿闍梨と号す。
sen.e: He entered into priesthood at Hieizan Enryaku-ji Temple, and took Iyo Ajari as his religious name.

sen.j: 兄に源義家、源義綱、源義光がいる。
sen.e: MINAMOTO no Yoshiie, MINAMOTO no Yoshitsuna, and MINAMOTO no Yoshimitsu are his brothers.
MINAMOTO no Yoshiie, MINAMOTO no Yoshitsuna, and MINAMOTO no Yoshimitsu were his brothers.

sen.j: すぐ上の兄の義光と懇意であり、天仁2年（1109年）に義光が甥の源義忠を暗殺した際にはその計画と実行に深く関わったと伝わる。
sen.e: He maintained an intimate relationship with his immediate elder brother Yoshimitsu, and when Yoshimitsu murdered his nephew, MINAMOTO no Yoshitada, it is said that he was deeply involved in its planning and execution.

sen.j: 義忠暗殺の下手人である平成幹は、暗殺実行の後この快誉の下に身を潜めるよう義光から指示を受けていた。
sen.e: TAIRA no Narimoto, Although the author of the assassination of Yoshitada, was instructed by Yoshimitsu to hide after the crime at the Kaiyo's wing, Kaiyo, after receiving him, Kaiyo buried him alive to death.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。二文分割のため、「いたが、」→「いた。」に文末を変更しました。
sen.e: TAIRA no Narimoto, although the architect of the assassination of Yoshitada, was instructed by Yoshimitsu to hide after the crime at Kaiyo's wing, and Kaiyo, after receiving him, buried him alive.

sen.j: しかし、快誉は成幹を受け入れると生き埋めにして殺してしまった。
sen.e: However, after receiving Narimoto, Kaiyo buried him alive and killed him.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処 前文との続きがよいように、文頭に「しかし、」を加えました。
sen.e: However, after receiving Narimoto, Kaiyo buried him alive and killed him.

sen.j: これは事件の口封じのために、義光・快誉兄弟があらかじめ示し合わせた上での所業であったとされる。
sen.e: It is said that the brothers Yoshimitsu and Kaiyo got together and conspired this act from the beginning in order to silence him and avoid the detection of the case.
